comment:
>>37758707

> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'm fine. Down below with a party, just lost a member to a surprise mini-boss.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Oh, uh.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Why do I want Celestial Gems so fucking badly?

As you think about the sensation again, there's a pulse in the back of your mind. You instinctively check your UI's menu. Good, it's still there... You don't know what you would have done if...

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Oh, hell. You found one? ))

"Talking to someone?" Vision asks. "See if they want to come down with us. We're in the market for a fifth.

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Cause I was wondering that myself... ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( It's kind of why I'm still playing. ))

"Uhm, one moment." You start leading the group cautiously further down, rounding a corner toward another bridge. In the fog, you can see more crawlers. They're getting further and further away.

> [[ Ayla ]]: (( It's, uh, a good feeling, isn't it? ))

[[ 1 ]]
> Respond to Ayla. ( Write-in. )

[[ 2 ]]
> Let the group know you're inviting someone else along.
> No sense wasting time. Keep moving down.
name: BSO
